Text.Page:
, after you left Exodor the federation established a site from which to explore Exodor and keep an eye on the Azart.

We need to send supplies to the point so come to me as soon as you see this order.

- Seir

You met the Loadmaster to get supplies for Exodor, and returned to Exodor using the Door of Dimension.

If you complete the quest, you can start [Dungeon - 463] Vogzu’s Summon and [Dungeon - 463] Hidden Enemy. Afterwards, the quest [Important] Kaia’s Anvil will be activated automatically.

According to Dougal's message, a teleportal has been appearing irregularly after the Black Core was destroyed.

We don't know what could come out from that teleportal...we must organize our defense.

Go to the Loadmasters and ask for support.
That's the exact kind of job we're looking for. Leave it to me!

I've heard rumors about it...but does it actually exist? I've never seen it in Velika.

But...orders are orders.

I'm glad to hear that everyone is willing to help.

Now, I want you to go and take care of the site. Assist Dougal.

Go and have a word with Gulan. He'll show you the way.

You've been to Exodor? That's quite surprising. I heard that a teleportal appeared. You should hear the details from Varlon.

I'll send you to Highwatch.

Say hi to Valron for me.

I'm glad you came. One of our brothers went to Exodor after receiving a message from Dougal.

You can now travel to Exodor using our teleportal. Use the teleportal to go to Exodor and meet Dougal.

! Welcome!

I believe you already heard that a teleportal appeared after the Black Core was destroyed.

There's also Azart remnants nearby. I want you to stop them.
